originalText.text:
I highly DON’T recommend this place. It’s already enough our family is going through the process of grieving my grandmother. But to deal with unprofessionalism and constantly getting the runaround about the status of order is truly absurd. I drove an
1 1/2 TWICE to see what the hold up was just to for Jose to dodge and avoid questions. An order that was placed almost a year ago had NO updates. Save yourself the trouble and headache and work with someone else for your loved ones.

originalText.text: PERPETRATOR OF A FRAUD!!!  Stay away from this place! They will take your money and give you excuses after excuses. Jose Espinal doesn’t answer phone calls and/or text messages. It has been 11 months since we initiated the contract for my grandfather’s headstone and he has yet to do anything.  Jose Espinal is the most irresponsible person we have met!! We are tired of waiting! Next step is court!!

originalText.text: horrible horrible horrible! We have been waiting over a year for our fathers headstone and there was an excuse after excuse. We are currently fighting with Jose Espinal for our refund. This is how our fathers headstone looks.

originalText.text: Gave the company a $1000 deposit with the expectation that it would take about two months.  As of today, 25Aug22, we are still waiting.  One excuse after another....Stay away from this company.

originalText.text:
Ojo hace 5 meses firme un contrato con este señor Jose
El punto que fui a su local porque yo misma quería ver su trabajo, cuando llegue el me ofreció diferentes modelos y precios de lápidas.
Entonces yo escogí el color favorito de mi padre eh incluso yo le dije que si podíamos ir a la factoría y el me dijo no, que el modelo que yo escoja ese se me entregaría yo confié en el,resulta que cuando me entregó fue otra muy diferente a la que aviamos quedado, honestamente no me gusto para nada, todo lo hizo a su conveniencia una piedra barata y allí en su camión llevaba muchas más del mismo estilo solo cambiaban los colores y nombres peor me moleste después de que este hombre no me contestaba y si contestaba es un señor que grita cuando le dices sus verdades,me hizo perder mi tiempo en fin encontré otro sitio que si son profesionales incluso me dibujaron la la lápida y todo será diseñado a mano.
Mientras con este señor es solo como que lo rasparon un poco y le echaron pintura no vayan a este sitio horrible ni tiene modales al cliente.

text.text:
Be careful, 5 months ago I signed a contract with this Mr. Jose.
The point is that I went to his place because I wanted to see his work myself, when I arrived he offered me different models and prices of tombstones.
So I chose my father's favorite color, and I even asked him if we could go to the factory and he told me no, that the model I chose would be delivered to me. I trusted him. It turns out that when he delivered it to me, it was another very different from the one we had left, honestly I didn't like it at all, a cheap stone made everything at his convenience and there in his truck he had many more of the same style, they only changed the colors and names, but it bothered me after this man didn't bother me. I answered and if I answered, it is a man who shouts when you tell him his truths, he made me waste my time, in the end I found another site that if they are professionals, they even drew my tombstone and everything will be designed by hand.
While with this man it's just like they scratched him a little and put paint on him, don't go to this horrible place and he doesn't have any manners towards the customer.
